subject: GT2 STEERING WHEEL
description_text:
Good morning, i had order my steering wheel at the end of last week, do you think it will arrive for christmas? 
Thank you so much
Inviato da iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Simone Bernardo,     Sure thing, no worries.  https://tms.trackmeeasy.com/home SF6047130778228

Hi again, sorry for write you again but the wheel is not yet arrived and my company (the shipping address) will be close for christmas next Wednesday, is very important that the wheel will be here by 23 december, because is a gift for my son, thank you again Inviato da iPhone Il giorno 12 dic 2025, alle ore 12:27, service@simsonn.com ha scritto: ﻿ 
 
 Hi Simone Bernardo, 
 
 Sure thing, no worries. 
 
https://tms.trackmeeasy.com/home SF6047130778228
